official_title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that a national summit of sports, political, community, and media leaders should be promptly convened to develop a multifaceted action plan to deter acts of violence, especially domestic violence and sexual assault.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Calls for a national summit to develop a multifaceted action plan to deter acts of violence, especially domestic violence and sexual assault. Calls upon summit members and other sports, community, political, and media leaders to assume leadership roles in deterring acts of domestic violence and sexual assault and support the measures developed by the summit.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that a national summit of sports, political, community, and media leaders should be promptly convened to develop a multifaceted action plan to deter acts of violence, especially domestic violence and sexual assault.
